title: Pixel 2 XL Does not support Airtel Volte
content:
Its been more than a year i am using Pixel 2XL. I have Airtel 4G enabled sim card i am not able to use VOLTE wit airtel sim card this irritates me a lot especially when i am on call i am not able to use my 4G Internet, while you get so many cheap phones in market which supports this, i feel shame on google they are still not fixing it with a minor update,  i have received latest security patch of 5th June 2019 and still on same issue.  

Wile it works with Jio Network 

I have uploaded a screenshot that display Enhanced 4G LTE Mode is misiing when i put Airtel Sim Card
and also with with jio simcard where i can see that option.

Please Fix this at earliest.

Disappointing by Google 



Screenshot using JIO sim card



Screenshot using Airtel sim card
